plot: Arne loses an arm in an accident, but miraculously a new arm appears. This new arm's got a will of its own and turns his life upside down. Void is replaced with joy, but miracles have a price.
title: A(r)men
plot_es: Arne loses an arm in an accident, but miraculously a new arm appears. This new arm's got a will of its own and turns his life upside down. Void is replaced with joy, but miracles have a price.
plot_en: Arne loses an arm in an accident, but miraculously a new arm appears. This new arm's got a will of its own and turns his life upside down. Void is replaced with joy, but miracles have a price.
